sentences.en: All he could see was his shadow.
sentences.cn: 他能看见的只有他的影子。

sentences.en: For a moment a shadow seemed to pass across Roy's face.
sentences.cn: 一瞬间罗伊脸上似乎闪过一丝忧伤。

sentences.en: He fills in a sketch with shadow.
sentences.cn: 他在画稿上添衬上阴影.

sentences.en: He has always lived in the shadow of his brother.
sentences.cn: 他一直活在他哥哥的影子中。

sentences.en: It was without a shadow of a doubt the best we've played.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问这是我们表现最出彩的一次。
我的女朋友与我形影不离.

sentences.en: Nothing would grow in the shadow of the grey wall.
sentences.cn: 灰墙的背阴处什么东西也长不出来。

sentences.en: Please stand to one side; you're casting your shadow over my work.
sentences.cn: 请你往边上站一站, 你挡着我的光线了.

sentences.en: She stood aghast at the black shadow in the drawing room.
sentences.cn: 她被客厅里的黑影吓呆了.

sentences.en: The current developments cast a shadow over the future of the talk.
sentences.cn: 目前的形势给谈判的前途投下了阴影.

sentences.en: The earth's shadow on the moon was quite distinct.
sentences.cn: 月球上的地球阴影很清晰.

sentences.en: The light from my candle threw his elongated shadow on the walls.
sentences.cn: 我的烛光将他拉长的影子投射在墙上。

sentences.en: the long dark shadow of an old oak tree
sentences.cn: 一棵老橡树长长的影子

sentences.en: The room was half in shadow.
The tree casts a shadow on the ground.
The trees throw a shadow on the grass.
sentences.cn: 树木在草地上投下了阴影.

sentences.en: They flew in over the beach, casting a huge shadow.
sentences.cn: 它们飞到海滩上空，抛下一大片黑影。
